Notification channel for urgent alarms when a fall is detected

When toggled, this application will receive data from the accelerometer in your mobile device, and detect a possible fall. 

 In case of detected fall, the application will start making a loud sound, so that anybody close to you can come help ! :-) 

 We want to make sure that nobody gets hurt, so please follow some simple steps in order to improve our detection ability : 

 - if you want our app to work, the toggle above needs to be activated 
 - when you are not using your phone, turn it off and place it in your pocket 
 - inform anybody that can help you that this feature is on, so they can keep an ear out and come promptly ! 
 - make sure that your phone is properly charged at any time

 Thank you for helping us help you :-)
